Type.Name: TextCaretMovedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TextCaretMovedHandler(object o, Atk.TextCaretMovedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the TextCaretMovedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the TextCaretMovedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the TextCaretMovedHandler is removed from the event.
